description: The photos appear to show the top, bottom, and back of the Fold 5.

title: The real danger of AI isn’t hyper-intelligence, it’s human stupidity
description: They say a good craftsman shouldn't blame his tools, but can a good tool blame a shoddy craftsman?

title: Apple could finally switch all AirPods to USB-C, starting with AirPods Pro

title: Galaxy Watch doesn’t work on tattooed wrist? Samsung’s working on a fix
description: Your Galaxy Watch should soon become better at wearing detection if you have inked wrists.

title: Nothing Phone 1 gets speed and power consumption improvements with latest update
description: Update: The latest Nothing OS update brings a number of performance improvements, a new security patch, and bug fixes.
